page.title: 06Local Industry,Stebbing
page.content: A family business, Bent-Marshall's started in 1852.They deal with earth moving,digging gravel and reservoir building.They do contract work and also hire equipment to Essex farmers and builders.They have five low- loaders which can carry up to 75 tons. These have 26 tyres ,each costing Â£200.They own a caterpillar tractor, two scrapers and a bulldozer. Essex X-Ray. This company makes{plugs for x-ray {machines}used in hospitals and industry and repairs cables.They are the {only company in Great Britain {making these specialised plugs.}Plugs are also returned to them for urgent repair.The cables take voltages of 200,000kwfor hospitals and 140,000 for industry.50%of their production is sold in Great Britain and 50% sold abroad.
